episode_event_anniversary_ch0286_ch0287/: Your new outfit looks perfect, Juliana!
Thanks, Florian! Yours looks great, too!

The festival starts today! Let’s get out there
and enjoy it!

Seems like Ogerpon and Terapagos want to
go with us.
Then let’s head over to the square!

When it comes to
festivals...

When I hear the word “festival,” it brings
me back to the Land of Kitakami’s Festival
of Masks!

Same here! The food stalls’ fried noodles and
candy apples were so tasty!

I competed against Carmine in Ogre Oustin’,
too. So many memories!

I’m so excited to see what kind of memories
we’ll make at the festivals on Pasio!

Together with their partners, Juliana and
Florian joined the festival on Pasio.
*chuckle* You’re in a good mood, Ogerpon!
Ogerpon loves festivals.

She also showed up at the Land of Kitakami’s
Festival of Masks—wearing a mask!

I guess if it weren’t for that festival, I never
would’ve met Ogerpon.

What is it, Terapagos? Curious what they
have at the food stalls?
Maybe he likes how lively everything is.

Oh yeah. Maybe it’s because he was asleep
deep in Area Zero for so long.
OK, Terapagos!

Today, I’ll show you what festivals are
all about!
This is all so strange.

It’s like you’re talking about my own
memories, even though they’re from a
different world.

I guess it just speaks to how similar our
worlds are, Juliana!

We’re even both friends with Ogerpon and
Terapagos!

Oh, you mean you also teamed up with
an Ogerpon?
Yup! She’s not with me right now, though.

Maybe I should bring her here too at
some point.
What’s wrong, Ogerpon?
Oh! Hey!
Hi, Kieran! Carmine!
Oh wow—it’s Ogerpon! And Terapagos, too!
I had a feeling you two would be here.
Is this your Ogerpon, Florian?
Wow! How’d you know?

Hehehe... She has a slightly different vibe
from the ogre I know!

As Kieran says, I brought this Ogerpon from
my world.
So that must mean...

This Terapagos is the one we and Juliana
met in Area Zero!
That’s right!

Seems the festival today is about to
get lively!
Heheh...
Ogerpon and Terapagos seem happy.

You OK, Kieran? Not forcing a smile,
are you?
No. But thanks, Sis.

I’m actually more worried by you being
unusually nice to me...

Huh?! I’m just looking out for you! You’d
better watch your mouth if you know what’s
good for you!
Hey, Florian.
Was I fond of the ogre in your world, too?

Yeah! We also battled to see who can
catch her!
Wowzers! We’re THAT similar?
But I’m glad Ogerpon is with you, Florian.

I knew I could leave the ogre in
Juliana’s care...

so that’s probably why in your world,
I entrusted her to you.

I hope you and Ogerpon remain good
friends! I’m counting on you!
Of course!

I think Ogerpon feels left out of the
conversation.
Heheh... Sorry!

Your Terapagos seems pretty calm,
Juliana.

Yeah, when I remember how much Juliana
and I struggled to battle him during our
investigation...it all feels unreal!
Yeah...

There’s still a lot I don’t know about
Terapagos, like the secret behind his
strength.
But for now, I just want us to grow closer!

I guess that’s how you’ve always been—
putting your Pokémon first.

Yeah. I know you’ll solve Terapagos’s
mysteries, Juliana!

So, for you peeps who want to grow closer
to your Pokémon...

Since I’m feeling nice, I’ll let you in on a
little secret!
What is it?

Did you know an event’s happening on
the festival’s main stage?
Oh? An event? I hadn’t heard!

Apparently it’s a tournament in which
sync pairs face off in three-on-three
Pokémon battles!
Whaaat?! That sounds fun! I wanna join!
Right?

You should snatch the victory—together with
your Pokémon!

Great idea! Ogerpon seems eager to
join, too!
Let’s all go together, Kieran!
Oh, uh... Y-yeah!

But if it’s teams of three, what about
Carmine?
I’m gonna pass this time.

I’ll leave it to you all to win the tournament.
I’m gonna relax and enjoy the festival.
Sis...
I-I got this! Hey, you two! Let’s win this!
Yeah!

At the tournament, on the festival’s
main stage...

Juliana’s team was on a winning streak,
and they made it to the finals!

Woo-hoo! If we win the next battle, victory
will be ours!
We’re on a roll! I feel unstoppable!

(Juliana’s gotten so much stronger since our
last battle.)

(And Florian’s no different. They really are
impressive!)
OK! I better keep up!
Hm?
Ogerpon? Terapagos? What’s wrong?

Maybe Ogerpon and Terapagos are trying
to say...
that you and Hydrapple are amazing, too!
Huh?
Do you really think so?

Hehehe... Seems they’re trying to boost
my spirit!

Hearing the Pokémon I love cheer me on
fills me with energy!

Hey, Kieran. About Ogerpon and
Terapagos...

They’re here with us now because you
helped us out.
Yeah!
So we know we can rely on you, Kieran!

As always, let’s work together and do our
best at the tournament today!
Yeah! Thanks, you two!
Next up are the finals... We’ve got this!

At last, Juliana and the others stepped
onstage for the final showdown!
And their opponents were...
Wowzers!

They’re all so incredible—and from different
regions, too!
Oh, hey! I knew you’d all be here!

I’m not even surprised! I had faith you’d
work your way up!

I wanted to battle you all, so I signed up
right away! I’m SO excited!

Terapagos is the source of Terastal energy,
so they’re bound to be a tough opponent!

Let’s see which is stronger—it or our
Dynamax Energy—and have a fun, fierce
battle!

I heard that in the Land of Kitakami,
when Ogerpon changes her mask,
she changes forms.

My Genesect can also take advantage of a
lot of type weaknesses, so I’m ready!
Let’s make this a great battle!

I can’t believe all these incredible Trainers
came together!
Right?! I can’t wait!
Nemona!

I lost pretty bad last time we battled in
Kitakami...

But I’ve gotten stronger since then!
I won’t lose!
I like your spirit!
Let’s battle with no regrets! Here we go!

The final match of the tournament was
fierce!
As the battle neared its end...
Now, Hydrapple! This is it!
Oof, that was a good one!

The team who won the nail-biting
battle was...
Juliana, Florian, and Kieran!

Terastallizing, huh? I’m glad I got to
experience that!
Thanks for the fantastic battle!

Thanks to you too, Leon! Your Dynamax
was strong!

We gave it our all, so it’s a bummer we
lost! But we’ll get even stronger—and
redeem ourselves!

Yeah! Ogerpon and I will grow
stronger, too!

Wowzers. It hasn’t quite hit me yet that we
actually won.

That was so much fun, Kieran! You’ve gotten
so strong!

Oh, uh... That’s probably because Juliana
and Florian—
...Or, maybe not.
If Nemona thinks so, maybe I have.
You seem a little different.
Ehehe. You think so?
It’s like all your hard work came to fruition!

Something you said back at Blueberry
Academy made me think.

You said it was awesome how dedicated I
can be—and that it was all because of my
love for Pokémon.
Maybe that’s why I was able to change.
Thanks for everything, Nemona.
Uh-huh!
Great job, all of you!

You followed my directions and claimed
victory! Good work!
I had SO much fun!

We had some tough opponents, though.
I’m spent!

So, Juliana. Did you become better friends
with Terapagos?
Yup! All thanks to you!

But now I’m realizing there’s even more to
him I still don’t know!

It’s OK, though, ’cause Terapagos has gotten
to know me pretty well!

Well, if you’re both satisfied, I guess
everything’s good.

Great job to you too, Ogerpon! You were so
cool out there!

I had so much fun battling with you!
We’ve made some great memories.

You were so in sync with Ogerpon without
any of us having to say anything! I was so
impressed!

I-I’m starting to feel embarrassed...
I’m glad I could help, though...
What’s wrong, Ogerpon? Are you hungry?

You were pretty active today! Should we
get something from one of the food stalls?
Great idea! I’ll come too!

Nice! Let’s splurge a little—to celebrate our
victory!
The festival’s only just begun!

Yeah, there are a bunch of shops I want to
check out!
Let’s go, Kieran!
Yeah! I want a candy apple!
Hahaha! I guess you’re still a little baby!
